New Records: The Cavaliers scored a franchise-record 136 points, the highest in a season opener and a regular season road game
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley scored a game-high 25 points with nine rebounds, three blocks, and two steals
The Cavaliers shot 58.6% from the field and 46.7% from three-pointers
The team won by a 30-point margin, the second-largest in franchise history
Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland’s head coach Kenny Atkinson emphasized the importance of spacing and defense before the game
Caris LeVert was prepared for any role, as indicated by coach Atkinson’s text
Post-Match Reflections: Jarrett Allen highlighted the team’s strong performance on both ends of the court as key to the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a strong offensive and defensive performance by the Cavaliers
The victory marked a positive start for coach Atkinson’s coaching debut
